name: Trials of Mana
description:
The goddess is asleep in the earth. The beast is dwelling in the stone. The power of mana is guided by the stone, and the great age of prosperity is broken.

Newly implemented, "Triangle Story".
The storyline changes depending on the combination of three parties selected from the six protagonist candidates. Who will set out on a TRIANGLE STORY journey into this mysterious world? Experience a feeling of realism, in this color-shaped fantasy.

  • Instantly switch between auto and manual!
  • Power up to your favorite type by class change.
  • A fantastically drawn world draws players in.
